titleStmt.title: The kings majesties proclamation, for calling of his Parliament in Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II).
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Whitehall the tenth day of October, and in the twelfth year of Our Reign, 1660.
Also includes: The list of persons entrusted by his Majesty, for conveening the shires to make election of the Commissioners to the Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
